variable.name: consent
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: subj_source
variable.description: Source repository where subjects originate [Coriell, WHI_SHARe]

variable.name: source_subjid
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository [for Coriell, dbGaP subject ids for WHI participants]

variable.name: affection_status
variable.description: Case control status of the subject
